notes: Environment consistency is critical for this sample. Character match is less important since there are no people. Focus on architectural elements, furniture positions, and lighting stability.

expectedResults.description: Environment should remain completely stable and consistent throughout camera pan
expectedResults.primaryConcern: Brick wall texture and color must not shift
expectedResults.secondaryConcern: Furniture positions relative to background must remain geometrically consistent
expectedResults.acceptableVariance: Minor lighting variations as camera pans across different window angles
